video_description: http://tabletblog.de/tag/huawei-mediapad - Unboxing and Hands On Video of the Huawei MediaPad, a 7 inch tablet with a resolution of 1280x800, a 1.2GHz dualcore CPU, 1GB memory, 8GB storage and Android 3.2 Honeycomb.
title: Huawei MediaPad Unboxing and Hands On
